title: Sirloin steak and salad
ingredients: ['1 (200g) sirloin steak', '3 to 5 sprays garlic spray oil', '3 to 5 pinches black pepper', '1/3 bag (about 2 handfuls) shop-bought salad', '50g bell pepper, finely chopped', '25g red onion, finely chopped', '6 to 7 small pickles, finely chopped', '20g blue cheese dressing']
